entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
